Persist editable Love Letter content in localStorage.

existing_features.title: Implement a multi-page React app with client-side navigation for these pages and paths: Page 1 Proposal ("/"), Page 2 Transition ("/yay"), Page 3 Gifts Hub ("/gifts"), Gift 1 Love Quiz ("/gifts/quiz"), Gift 2 Love Letter ("/gifts/letter"), Gift 3 Photo Gallery ("/gifts/gallery"), Final Page Forever & Always ("/forever").

Create a consistent global visual theme across all pages: deep navy background (#0a1628), glowing blue accents, white text, glassmorphism cards (blur + subtle blue borders), and smooth transitions/animations. Ensure mobile-first responsive layout suitable for sharing.

Add a reusable animated background effect visible across all pages: floating blue heart emojis and a subtle falling-hearts layer, rendered behind the main content and not interfering with clicks/taps.

Build Page 1 (Proposal, path "/"): dark navy background with a central large glowing blue heart, and a glass card containing heading "Will you be my Valentine?" and subtitle "I have something special for you...". Include two buttons: a glowing blue "Yes" button that increases in size on each click, and a "No" button that moves to a random position when clicked (effectively preventing a "No"). Clicking "Yes" navigates to Page 2.

Build Page 2 (Transition, path "/yay"): show a brief celebratory screen with a large glowing blue heart, heading "Yay! ðŸ¥°" and subtitle "Taking you to your gifts...". Auto-navigate to Page 3 after ~2 seconds.

Render three clickable gift cards: "ðŸ§  Love Quiz â€” How well do you know us?", "ðŸ’Œ Love Letter â€” Words from my heart", and "ðŸ“¸ Our Gallery â€” Moments we treasure". Each card navigates to its corresponding gift page.

Implement Gift 1: Love Quiz page (path "/gifts/quiz"): include 5 pre-filled cute/quirky multiple-choice questions (customizable later via visual edits), each with exactly 4 options and 1 correct answer. Provide a fun quiz flow (next/back or sequential), compute score, and show an end screen with a cute message and the numeric score (e.g., "3/5").

Implement Gift 2: Love Letter page (path "/gifts/letter"): display a love letter inside a beautiful glass card. Add a creator edit mode toggled by a pencil/edit button that lets the creator modify the letter text and save it. Persist the saved letter text in localStorage so it remains after refresh. When not editing, show the formatted letter view only.

Implement Gift 3: Photo Gallery page (path "/gifts/gallery"): display a grid of 4â€“6 photos with optional captions. Provide an edit mode to upload/replace images and edit captions; on Save, the upload/edit UI disappears and only the gallery remains. Store images in localStorage as base64 along with captions. Provide a small, unobtrusive hidden reset/re-edit option behind a small icon so the creator can re-enter edit mode. Include a clearly labeled button near the bottom that navigates to the final page ("/forever").

Build Final Page (Forever & Always, path "/forever"): show a large glowing blue heart animation, heading "Forever & Always", italic subtitle "I love you more than words could ever say", and a heartfelt closing message inside a glass card. Add lots of floating blue heart emojis concentrated near the bottom while still keeping the global floating/falling hearts effect.

Add a clearly labeled button at the end (bottom) of the Gifts Hub page ("/gifts") with user-facing text "Finally" that navigates to the final page route "/forever".
